      • onStatusChanged

        public void onStatusChanged(TankStatusEventArgs ev)
        Description copied from interface: Tank.TankEventListener
        This event is fired when a tank status changes

        Note : Currently only the status of Blocked and AutoBlocking fire this event

        Specified by:
